title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Engineered a scalable microservice in Go (Gin) for an influencer e-commerce application, single-handedly developing modules for authentication, video handling, and user engagement.
Migrated and enhanced a RAG-based AI assistant (PMA-GPT) using Python Firebase Functions and Pinecone, adding features like chat session management and multi-modal interaction with videos and PDFs.
Developed and integrated a backend module using NestJS for the PromptLab platform, connecting it with the frontend.
Integrated a Next.js (TypeScript) application into a WordPress environment for Vetsie AI, enabling communication with its member system and database.

title: Freelance Backend & AI Developer
responsibilities: Developed and deployed custom Python backends for AI/ML applications, including computer vision and process automation.
Co-developed 'Scam Eye,' a spam detection tool utilizing custom-trained models and OpenAI LLMs.
Built and integrated Node.js (Express) backends with payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal) and third-party APIs (Twilio).
